mapper.select: select * from ( SELECT tdt.`name` AS typename, td.`name` AS NAME, td.site AS site, td.update_time AS updateTime, td.ip AS ip, td.`status` AS `status`, tp.tpressure as tpressure, td.type AS type FROM t_dev td INNER JOIN t_dev_type tdt ON td.type = tdt.id INNER JOIN t_pressure tp ON td.id = tp.dev_id WHERE 1=1 AND td.type= #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND td.`icustomerid` = #{icustomerid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND td.`status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND td.`name` LIKE "%"#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" ) a
